name: Sandra A. CHRISTMAN, Administratrix of the Estate of Esther I. Strause, Deceased, Respondent v. MANOR CARE OF WEST READING PA, LLC, d/b/a ManorCare Health Services-West Reading North, and ManorCare Health Services, Inc. and HCR ManorCare, Inc. and ManorCare Inc. and HCR HealthCare, LLC, and HCR II HealthCare, LLC, and HCR III HealthCare, LLC, and HCR IV HealthCare, LLC, Petitioners
name_abbreviation: Christman v. Manor Care of West Reading PA, LLC

judges: Justice Mundy did not participate in the consideration or decision of this matter.
parties: Sandra A. CHRISTMAN, Administratrix of the Estate of Esther I. Strause, Deceased, Respondent v. MANOR CARE OF WEST READING PA, LLC, d/b/a ManorCare Health Services—West Reading North, and ManorCare Health Services, Inc. and HCR ManorCare, Inc. and ManorCare Inc. and HCR HealthCare, LLC, and HCR II HealthCare, LLC, and HCR III HealthCare, LLC, and HCR IV HealthCare, LLC, Petitioners

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM
AND NOW, this 17th day of October, 2016, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is GRANTED, the order of the Superior Court is VACATED, and the case is REMANDED to the Superior Court for further proceedings consistent with our holding in Taylor v, Extendicare Health Facilities, Inc., 637 Pa. 163, 147 A.3d 490 (2016).
Justice Mundy did not participate in the consideration or decision of this matter.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM

casebody.head_matter:

No. 97 MAL 2016
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
DECIDED: October 17, 2016
